title: Hunt of the First Thorn
trigger: Elven rites fail repeatedly to offload corruption among highborn.
stakes: Recover or destroy the relic that once tempted Eve.
beats: Black sap sings under bark; hunters track by taste of fear-sweat.
Brine-fog rolls inland; drowned bells toll where no chapel stands.
A living briar forms around a thorn the size of a dirk.
objectives: Trail the elven coterie without entering the singing groves.
Parley with brine-witches for safe mire-crossing (offer salt or names).
Decide the Thornâ€™s fate: burn, bind, or bear it.

burn: Elves shift to open raids; relations worsen.
bind: Craft a one-use anti-corruption rite (halve corruption once).
Backlash risk: target gains 'Veil Whispers' for 24 hours.
bear: Wielder gains Veil ward (+10 resist) and occasional whispers.
Random Thorn_Stalker ambush chance increases in the region.
